question: What is the next number in the sequence: 2, 6, 12, 20, 30?
What is the sum of the first 100 natural numbers?
If a person walks at 5 km/hr instead of 4 km/hr, he would have walked 20 km more. What is the actual distance traveled by him?
A train 100 m long is running at 30 km/hr. In how much time will it pass a bridge 200 m long?
What is the average of the first 50 even numbers?
If the cost price of 20 articles is equal to the selling price of 15 articles, what is the profit percentage?
What is the compound interest on Rs. 5000 for 2 years at an interest rate of 5% per annum?
If the radius of a circle is doubled, what will be the effect on its area?
A man can row downstream at 6 km/hr and upstream at 4 km/hr. What is the speed of the man in still water?
A shopkeeper sold an article at a loss of 20%. If the cost price of the article was Rs. 500, what was the selling price?
What is the simple interest on Rs. 2000 for 3 years at an annual rate of 5%?
If a train travels 60 km in 1.5 hours, what is its speed?
What is the perimeter of a rectangle with length 20 cm and width 10 cm?
If the ratio of two numbers is 3:4 and their sum is 35, what is the smaller number?
A person spends 40% of his income on rent, 30% on food, and the rest on savings. If his income is Rs. 5000, how much does he save?
What is the value of x if 2x - 4 = 10?
If the selling price of an article is Rs. 240 and the loss percentage is 20%, what is the cost price?
What is the least common multiple (LCM) of 6, 8, and 12?
A man bought a book for Rs. 500 and sold it at a profit of 20%. What was the selling price?
What is the square root of 144?
If a person invests Rs. 8000 at 5% per annum simple interest, how much will he get after 3 years?
If the average of five numbers is 30, what is their sum?
What is the value of 3 raised to the power of 4?
What is the area of a triangle with base 10 cm and height 5 cm?
A boat travels 20 km downstream in 2 hours and the same distance upstream in 4 hours. What is the speed of the boat in still water?
What is the cube root of 27?
If the perimeter of a square is 40 cm, what is its side length?
If the selling price is Rs. 900 and the profit is 20%, what is the cost price?
What is the difference between the squares of 9 and 7?
What is the value of x if 5x + 3 = 23?
What is the greatest common divisor (GCD) of 18 and 24?
If a car travels 120 km in 3 hours, what is its average speed?
If the circumference of a circle is 31.4 cm, what is its radius? (Take π = 3.14)
What is the value of 7 factorial (7!)?
If a person saves Rs. 200 per month, how much will he save in 5 years?
What is the sum of the interior angles of a pentagon?
If a worker is paid Rs. 200 for 8 hours of work, what is his hourly wage?
A person walks 3 km north, then 4 km east. What is the shortest distance to his starting point?
What is the value of (a + b)² if a = 2 and b = 3?
If 12 men can complete a work in 10 days, how many men are needed to complete it in 6 days?
What is the median of the following numbers: 3, 5, 8, 12, 15?
If the side of a cube is doubled, what happens to its volume?
If a person earns Rs. 2000 per week, how much does he earn in a year?
If the radius of a circle is 7 cm, what is the area? (Take π = 3.14)
If the price of an article is reduced by 10%, it becomes Rs. 450. What was the original price?
What is the probability of getting a head when a coin is tossed?
If a number is divisible by both 2 and 3, it is divisible by which of the following?
What is the next prime number after 7?
If a person buys 3 pens for Rs. 15, how much would he pay for 7 pens?
